title: Nine sermons vpon sun[drie] texts of scripture first, The allegeance of the cleargie, The supper of the Lord, secondly, The Cape of Good Hope deliuered in fiue sermons, for the vse and b[ene]fite of marchants and marriners, thirdly, The remedie of d[r]ought, A thankes-giuing for raine / by Samuel Page ...
author: Page, Samuel, 1574-1630.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Sim[on Wat]erson dwell[ing in] Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the crowne,
